name: Acid Spy
description: Acid Spy is a first person stealth action game set in a cyberpunk universe. Infiltrate heavily guarded bases and take down your enemies with skill and finesse. Master the art of quick, deadly stealth to become the acid spy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space
